fennick: Fennick. Ranger. Fox. Holding a bow. High fantasy.
abyssal_lurker: Abyssal Lurker. Gray. Brown. Lobster claws. High fantasy.
blind_horror: Blind Horror. Enemy creature. Sickly gray skin. Stringy black hair. Claws for eyes. High fantasy. Full body.
coral_golem: Sea coral. Has eyes. Has arms. High fantasy.
bg_cliffs_01: Scorched Trail. Blistering Cliffsides. Lava sparks. Red and maroon rocks. Dark fantasy pixel art.
bg_cliffs_02: Ember Fields. Blistering Cliffsides. Dark fantasy pixel art.
bg_forest_01: Dark woods. Empty. RPG battle background. No people. Dark Fantasy.
map_eruption_vent: A violent vent spewing lava. Dark Fantasy. Pixel Art.
map_janxier_floodplain: A desolate floodplain. No monsters. No people. Dark Fantasy. Pixel Art.
map_old_fort_calindash: An arial view of a dilapidated outpost. There is an outer wall, a courtyard, a chapel, a barracks, and a ruined keep. No people. No animals. No monsters. Dark Fantasy. Pixel Art.
map_ancient_catacombs: Above view of some Ancient Catacombs, like the ceiling is see-thru. Other than the entrance, there are 5 rooms. There is a hall of bones. a cursed gallery. a sarcophagus chamber. a sanctum and finally a ritual chamber and throne. No people. No monsters. No animals. Dark Fantasy. Pixel Art.
